message.body: i feel sorta weird seeing pj at single smile all the time. like i know things about him and he doesn even know who i am.
please tell me you're awake. i just had the most awkward conversation ever with my mother.
I'm at breakfast with Ashlyn. Can I call you in like 15 minutes?
i'm gonna be at target by then probably. where are you at breakfast? want to come hang out with me?
boo, okay. well, call me when you can and i'll try and answer. i need to talk about this thing if only to laugh at how ridiculous my life can be.
the doctor called and my mom was right. :/ andrew is going to hateee meeee. how do you even tell someone that?
also how late are you working tonight?
Gosh girl. I'm sorry :( I wish I ha advice for you. And it depends on how busy we are. 10 at the latest.
i'm just gonna be up front about it, i guess, and act like it's not a big deal. and oh. for some reason i thought you had different hours on tuesdays.
I always work at the pepper at night, but I usually don't work 10-2. :\
ohhh, okay. well, i hope your day's going okay!
